Search Unit 2: Web Fundamentals

filenamify-url

Convert a URL to a valid filename

Install

$ npm install --save filenamify-url

Usage

var filenamifyUrl = require('filenamify-url');

filenamifyUrl('http://sindresorhus.com/foo?bar=baz');
//=> sindresorhus.com!foo!bar=baz

filenamifyUrl('http://sindresorhus.com/foo', {replacement: 'üê¥'});
//=> sindresorhus.comüê¥foo

API

See the filenamify API.
